content.en: Smart canal control: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to control irrigation canals and improve water distribution. These algorithms are designed to automatically adjust gate settings based on water level and flow rate information, maintain a constant water depth, and control water distribution among users' outlets. They use techniques such as linear optimal control theory, proportional-plus-integral controllers, and model predictive control methods to achieve efficient and accurate control of the canal systems.
content.da: Smart kanalstyring: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at kontrollere vandingskanaler og forbedre vandfordelingen. Disse algoritmer er designet til automatisk at justere portindstillinger baseret på vandstand og flowhastighedsoplysninger, opretholde en konstant vanddybde og kontrollere vandfordeling blandt brugernes udløb. De anvender teknikker såsom lineær optimal kontrolteori, proportional-plus-integral controllere og modelprædiktive kontrolmetoder for at opnå effektiv og præcis styring af kanalsystemerne.
